title: Rear ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Installation

body.body: Rear ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Installation
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Check the condition of the shim before use. Do not use a shim which is bent or damaged.
Position the wheel speed sensor to the rear caliper carrier with its shim between the sensor and caliper carrier. Fit a new bolt and tighten to
Route the harness and secure to the brake hose clips and rear caliper bleed screw cap as noted for removal.
Connect the wheel speed sensor multiplug and secure to its bracket on the crankcase breather cover.
Rear ABS Sensor Air Gap Measurement
